answers.answer: have u had a test to rule out diabetes?i was very lethargic the first 9 months of my sobriety...got 28 years now.....xcessive caffeine and sweets didn't help that either....it passed i mad healthier choices.....a high fiber diet w/lowfat proteins usually helps this...ya gotta figger if u were abusing ur body w/alcohol,drugs,nicotine and poor eating habits..it takes TIME for one to get ironed out again!

question: I've kicked the smokes and drinking for over a week now,  nicotine gum for the smoking, and willpower for the drinking.  thing is i'm so damn sleepy and tired, can't put a finger on it,  mentally i feel sharp and clear headed, only other physical symptom is my sweat smells like urine and my urine smells sweet - (not diabetic).  i've been drinking heaps of water and exercising. wondering if anyone else has experienced similar and how long it lasted?  the sleepiness especially..thanks
title: always sleepy and smelling awful after stopping for a week
